title: Video: Young Magic â€“ Sparkly
content:
Fresh from touring with Boise sensation Youth Lagoon earlier in the year, Young Magic have dropped a new track, as well as confirming details of their debut full length record.

Sparkly is a glittering ethereal number, dreamily perceptive and wonderfully stirring, mirrored perfectly by the serene video, swinging between idyllic beaches and psychedelic mashes of vibrant colors. Taken from their debut LP Melt, due out on 14 February via Carpark Records, 2012 is set to be an important year for Young Magic.

Directed and Shot by Dylan Wiehahn
Production Design/Construction by Kell Bendle
Costume by Kiara Bulley
Featuring Megan Elizabeth McKee
Edited by Bek Andersen
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
